prop.caption: progress
prop.description: the progress of the sync. A number between 0 and 1.

prop.caption: position
prop.description: the progress of the sync.

prop.caption: length
prop.description: the total length of items to sync.

prop.caption: syncing
prop.description: whether the application is syncing while coming online.

prop.caption: onLine
prop.description: whether the application is online. This property is false during sync.

prop.caption: resources
prop.description: the resources that should be kept offline and synced later. This is a pipe '|' seperated list.

prop.caption: rdb-timeout
prop.description: the number of milliseconds after the remote databindings server considers a client offline and destroys all saved offline messages.

prop.caption: version-get
prop.description: a datainstruction for getting a version number of the current application

prop.caption: providers
prop.description: a pipe seperated list of possible providers.

prop.caption: auto-install
prop.description: whether the required plugin is installed when it's not installed yet.

prop.caption: detect-url
prop.description: a datainstruction for getting a version number of the current application

prop.caption: detection
prop.description: a pipe seperated list of possible providers.

prop.caption: interval
prop.description: whether the required plugin is installed when it's not installed yet.

prop.caption: realtime
prop.description: whether changes are stored realtime.

prop.caption: set
prop.description: a datainstruction that stores the state of the application to an external data store.

prop.caption: losechanges
prop.description: Fires before the offline state is removed.

prop.caption: beforeoffline
prop.description: Fires before bringing the application offline.

prop.caption: afteroffline
prop.description: Firest after the application is brought offline.

prop.caption: beforeonline
prop.description: Fires before bringing the application online.

prop.caption: afteronline
prop.description: Fires after the application is brought online.

prop.caption: beforeload
prop.description: Fires before loading the offline state into this application.

prop.caption: sync
prop.description: Fires at each sync item's completion.

prop.caption: beforeinstall
prop.description: Fires before installation of an offline provider

prop.caption: afterinstall
prop.description: Fires after installation of an offline provider

prop.caption: transactioncancel
prop.description: Fires before installation of an offline provider enableable Cancels the installation of the offline provider

prop.caption: propertychange
prop.description: Fires when a property changes.
